ROOT.GetLines: SELECT id FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_LINE_HBZC WHERE ID IS NOT NULL
ROOT.GetStations: SELECT id FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_STATION_HBZC WHERE ID IS NOT NULL
ROOT.GetLinesByVoltage: SELECT id,name FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_LINE_HBZC WHERE ID IS NOT NULL AND voltage={v} ORDER BY NAME
ROOT.GetDcLines: SELECT id,name FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_LINE_HBZC WHERE ID IS NOT NULL AND voltage LIKE 'Â±%' ORDER BY NAME
